sources.title: Witches (1961) LIBBY HALLüçïLARRY BUCHANAN
sources.description:
Exclusive PizzaFLIX Halloween Edition. Restored and specially edited for YouTube. 
Stars: Libby Hall, Denis Adams, Charles West, Howard Ware
Writers/Directors: Claude Alexander, Larry Buchanan

This is the story of a beautiful witch killed centuries ago. When a curious student opens her grave, he removes a dagger from her heart. Released from her earthly tomb, she embarks on a campaign of revenge against her murderer‚Äôs descendants. Will he end her reign of terror? Or fall for her hypnotic beauty?

Movie Class by PizzaFLIX: Self-declared ‚ÄúSchlockmeister‚Äù Larry Buchanan (1923-2004) made roughly 30 movies over four decades, horrifying critics but delighting fans.  With titles like ATTACK OF THE EYES CREATURES (1965) and CURSE OF THE SWAMP CREATURE, his Z-Movies also gratified financial backers as his "guerrilla" style of filmmaking usually turned a profit.
